cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/core-util/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_CORE-UTIL_CPP_FILES
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/core-util/source/PoolAllocator.cpp"
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/core-util/source/ExtendablePoolAllocator.cpp"
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/core-util/source/atomic_ops.cpp"
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/core-util/source/mbed-util_mbed.c"
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/core-util/source/sbrk.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_CORE-UTIL_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/build/frdm-k64f-gcc/yotta_config.h")
set(YOTTA_AUTO_CORE-UTIL_C_FILES
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/core-util/source/mbed-util_mbed.c"
)
# force dependency on the config header for c files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_CORE-UTIL_C_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/build/frdm-k64f-gcc/yotta_config.h")


add_library(core-util
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_CORE-UTIL_CPP_FILES}
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_CORE-UTIL_C_FILES}
)

yotta_postprocess_target(LIBRARY core-util)



target_link_libraries(core-util
    ualloc
    cmsis-core
    mbed-drivers
)
